name: Voidrun
description:
The Void will consume each part of our universe.
Until then as his underling you are asked to wipe out all life forms on four planets.
For this task The Void will grant you 4 gifts.
Don't become attached to them because what the Void give, the Void will take back.

On each run 4 planets and 4 gifts are chosen among
  • 9 planets with unique biome & ennemies
  • 17 void gifts

Each time you void a planet, the void will take one gift back.
Destroy the four planets to win the run.
